name: <ops::control_flow::ControlFlow<B, C> as fmt::Debug>::fmt

fmt::Formatter::<'a>::debug_tuple_field1.doc:
Shrinks `derive(Debug)` code, for faster compilation and smaller
 binaries. `debug_tuple_fields_finish` is more general, but this is faster
 for 1 field.

ops::control_flow::ControlFlow: Unknown([Deref, Downcast(VariantIdx(1, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(0, Ty { id: 3241, kind: Param(ParamTy { index: 0, name: "B" }) })])
Unknown([Deref, Downcast(VariantIdx(0, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(0, Ty { id: 0, kind: Param(ParamTy { index: 1, name: "C" }) })])
